name: Rewinder (Scratchy)
description:
Controls:

Space

Space

Space

Seriously, The only control is Space. 

Instructions:

Your player (Circle thing) will move in the direction the target it (Random dot I made in MS paint) the goal is to get the circle to the arrow! "But Scratchy, What if the arrow is on the opposite side of the target?" Well then, Press space! Holding Space will reverse the direction of your player!
